lexUnit.name: excommunicate.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: officially exclude from participation in the sacraments and services of the Christian Church.

sentence.text: Among these last was Archbishop Reynolds who had at first excommunicated the invaders by pressing into service a ten-year-old denunciation against the Scots !
